alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:08AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 to 3 inches for valleys and 5 to 8 inches for the higher terrain and mountain passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Salmon, Bannock Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Lemhi Pass, and Shoup. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
